segments.text: Sorry , I overslept . My alarm clock didn't go off this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , even though I did set the alarm last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your clock never works . Perhaps you should buy a new one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . If it breaks down again tomorrow , I'll definitely buy a new one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe by then it will be too late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean too late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By that time , you will be fired .
segments.speaker: S2
